mapper.select: select a.* from t_sys_resource a left join sys_role_resource_relation b on a.uid = b.resource_id left join sys_user_role_relation c on b.role_id = c.role_id where c.user_id = #{id};
select b.* from sys_role_resource_relation a left join t_sys_resource b on a.resource_id = b.uid where a.role_id = #{id};
